fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Twice per game, you can decide to prevent all kills that night.
- Everyone will be told that a Pacifist made them put down their weapons if they tried to attack that night.
- The first time you would be executed, you will not die, because the town feels bad executing someone so peaceful.
- The day will end after the failed execution.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent 5 kills (preventing your own execution counts as a prevented kill).
